.slick-next:before{content:""}.component.cards .slider .slick-next:before,[dir=rtl] .component.cards .slider .slick-next:before{font-family:CMEGroup-Icons!important;speak:none;font-style:normal;font-weight:400;font-variant:normal;text-transform:none;line-height:1;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;-moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale}[dir=rtl] .component.cards .slider .slick-next:before{content:""}.component.cards .no-results{text-align:center;margin:.9375rem auto;font-size:2.125rem;color:#112b4a;border:1px solid #112b4a}.component.cards .no-results h4{padding:1.25rem}
